item.title: Pulumi, CloudFront & Lambda@Edge: Infrastructure
item.description: This post is part of a small series of articles on using Pulumi to leverage CloudFront and Lambda@Edge for on the fly image resizing.

item.title: Pulumi, CloudFront & Lambda@Edge: Introduction
